existing_features.title: Add an authentication control to the primary navigation that lets users log in and log out using the existing Internet Identity provider. The control must show a "Log in" button when the user is not authenticated and a "Log out" button when the user is authenticated, and it must work in both desktop and mobile navigation layouts.

Add a "Subscribe" button to the primary navigation that is available in both desktop and mobile navigation layouts. The button must navigate to a new in-app subscription information page/route (e.g., "/subscribe") that explains subscription options in a simple, static, school-friendly way (no payment processing).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a login button to the UI
Add a subscription button to the UI
